message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling you this amazing product. I think it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. As we start our negotiation, I'm willing to offer you a price of $13000 for the product. I believe this is a fair starting point, considering its value to you is $15000. Let me know what you think!
